Violation of human rights through covert forced abductions of citi- zens for hybridization experimentation was the least of the troubles created by the Zetas’ involvement. In 1943 the Zetas used the opportunity presented by the Philadelphia Experiment to begin their plan of shifting the Earth’s grid out of alignment with Tara via manipulating the energy fields of the Sun. To the present day, the Interior Government does not realize that it was this event which triggered abnormal activity on the Sun between 1949 and 1972, activity which had some of Earth’s scientific community very concerned about the probability of a major pole shift occurring sometime during the 1970s or 1980s.
